itemLabel: Granville Eliot, 7th Earl of St Germans

wikipedia_page.main: Granville John Eliot, 7th Earl of St Germans (22 September 1867 – 20 November 1942) was an English aristocrat.

link_mentions.page: Granville John Eliot, 7th Earl of St Germans
response: #REDIRECT Granville Eliot, 7th Earl of St Germans
*Granville Eliot, 7th Earl of St Germans (1867–1942), hereditary peer

link_mentions.page: Montague Eliot, 8th Earl of St Germans
response: On 22 November 1942 Eliot succeeded his older brother Granville Eliot, 7th Earl of St Germans to become the 8th Earl of St Germans.
